```{r}
library(tidyverse)
```


```{r}
life_expectancy = 
  read_csv("data/life_expectancy.csv") %>% 
  janitor::clean_names()

continent_df =
  read_csv("data/countryContinent.csv") %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>% 
  select(country,continent)

# df with continent

life_expectancy_df = 
  life_expectancy %>% 
  inner_join(continent_df, by = "country") %>% 
  relocate(country,continent) %>% 
  mutate(year = as.character(year))

```


```{r}
check_na = function(x) {
  
  na = 
    life_expectancy_df %>%  
    filter(is.na(x)) %>%  
    count()
  
  return(na)
}
```
